ValidationRule.description: This rule ensures that a fact find with a complete date is left in a review fact find status of complete.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
NOT( ISPICKVAL( OW_review_fact_find_status__c, "Complete" ) )
&&
ISCHANGED( OW_review_fact_find_status__c )
&&
NOT( ISBLANK( OW_completed_by_client__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This fact find has been completed by the customer so the review fact find status cannot be changed.
